script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next act comes all the way from Milan, Italy! Please welcome Andrea, a hopeless romantic with a heart full of music and a dream to share his passion with the world. Tonight, he's chosen a very special song, 'Good Riddance (Time of Your Life)' by Green Day. But here's the twist – he's dedicating it to one of our judges, Sara Bareilles! Andrea, tell us, what's the story behind this bold dedication?

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: Woo hoo! Sara, this one's for you!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Well, this is awkward.  Just kidding, Andrea! Good song choice, man. You got guts dedicating it to another judge right in front of me.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Ha! You alright there, Billie? Andrea's got it bad for Sara, man. You gotta respect the dedication though.  Plus, everyone loves a good love story, right Alanis?

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Absolutely! There's a real sweetness to it. And Andrea, your voice has a beautiful, raw quality. Very heartfelt.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Oh my goodness, Andrea! I'm completely flattered. Thank you.  That was really lovely.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Andrea, you've certainly brought the romance to the stage tonight! Judges, what do you say? Did Andrea's performance win your hearts, and perhaps even a certain someone's phone number?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: He's got my vote!  Solid performance, dude. And hey, if Sara's not interested, you can always dedicate a song to me next time.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: It's a yes from me!  Andrea, you poured your heart out there.  Go for it, man!

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, you have a genuine warmth and a lovely voice.  I'm saying yes.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you're incredibly talented and very brave.  It's a yes from me.  But maybe we'll stick to music for now.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses! Andrea, congratulations! You've won over our judges with your talent and your heart. Who knows, maybe this is the start of a beautiful musical collaboration... or more! We'll be right back after a quick break.
